Pre-Game Insights: Christopher Morel's Tampa Bay Rays face the Cleveland Guardians on Sept. 13 at 7:10 PM ET, and will see starter Tanner Bibee on the mound.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christopher Morel has launched a team-best 21 homers (he’s added 57 RBI).
Among pitchers with enough innings to qualify, the 25-year-old’s 3.56 ERA ranks 25th, 1.130 WHIP ranks 18th, and 9.7 K/9 ranks 12th.
Others: Christopher Morel has been set down on strikes at least once 97 times this year in 139 games played (69.8%), including 46 multi-strikeout contests (33.1%).
Morel has hit a long ball in 20 games this season (139 opportunities, 14.4%), leaving the ballpark in 3.7% of his chances at the plate.
